Blog.post: Oh my god I feel really sick because I found some cooking chocolate and I melted it andthen just ate it. Ugh my belly hurts!!! ((Yawn)) =_= I'm so tired I got MSN messenger today and I thought I had my friend zoes email but I sent a message and it was some French girl she kept sending messages so I blocked her, yes I no its mean. So stacey if your reading this send me some email addresses I want someone to talk to on msn I went to dancin last night it was really good we're doin a dance to superstar by jameilia but it looks like I'll miss the next 2 classes cause I'm on holiday so I'm really miffed. Any way my mum wants me to have sacha round to night oh I've just had an idea maybe we could go out for a meal but oh sally would need to know so that she could get Josh a babysitter. This morning I started writing a story and I decided that i'd put little bits of it on my blog so hears a little passage from thge first chapter: She had never known her father and had always wished that she could just know who he was just meet him or even just to catch a glimpse of his face see if he was short or if he had blue eyes, anything. All Sarah wanted was to know her father. If you like it leave a comment and I'll post some more of it got to go now by me lovelys see ya soon

Hello chickens its me again i'm at my friend staceys house we just watched scary movie 3 its hilarious so funny remember yesterday i said we were gonna book a holiday well we have its gonna be F.A.B woohoo were goin to this place called derby sounds borin but its not theres a huge theme park and a mega zoo!!!!! and get this the week after that were going to mallorca for a whole 7 days of sun sand and a private villa and pool. right now that the good stuffs out of the way i'll have a moan about a certain someone with a shiny head her name is buff buff, shiny head and annoying little childish blond retard with no brain and a shiny head!!! me and stacey absolutley hate her she a little biatch!!!!!! she is so bigheaded and always shows off cause her mums a hair dresser and she says that she knows about hairdressing darling if you knew about hair you'd get your retarted roots done!!!! O.K!!!! ((stacey: My arse has more style than her(grinning!!!)) o.k my chickey babys i have to go now so seeyas laters!!!!! p.s I hate buff buff!!!

Hi all you little chickens out there I,ve just got a blog and this is my first post thing!!!! so its the summer holidays and today are friends are coming round and we are going to book a holiday it will only be a 2 or 3 day thing but i know it will be fun cause we did the same thing lst year and it was F.A.B!!! thats my new little word thing if someone asked if i liked something or how i am today you know i just say F.A.B its copying off the thunderbirds i know!! but its myne now! Ha Ha Ha Ha !!!!!!!!!!!!! so i can't be bothered to write anything else today cause I'm knackerd oh there here now got to go bye my little chikens p.s Hi stacey and kelly

as stated in tyhe title i'm sorry i haven't been writing but i've been away on a little holiday to Derby it was F.A.B and on sat I'm goin to mallorca so i'll be gone for a week. anyways I can't believe stus out of the bb house no no no no no no no no no no noooooooooooooooo he was one of m faves and hes pretty cute oh sorry I have to go now ugh Its like I never have time to write in here anyway nxt time there will be more of my story bye my little stuffing bunch!!
